Var.name: time_aside_str_ch
Var.expression: ifelse( ge(#hour24, 0) *lt(#hour24, 3), @time_0_2 , ge(#hour24, 3) *lt(#hour24, 6), @time_3_5 , ge(#hour24, 6) *lt(#hour24, 10), @time_6_9 , ge(#hour24, 10) *lt(#hour24, 12), @time_10_11 , ge(#hour24, 12) *lt(#hour24, 13), @time_12 , ge(#hour24, 13) *lt(#hour24, 17), @time_13_16 , ge(#hour24, 17) *lt(#hour24, 19), @time_17_18 , ge(#hour24, 19) *lt(#hour24, 24), @time_19_23 , @time_0_2 )

Image.name: am_pm
Image.srcExp: 'time/time_'+ifelse(eq(#current_language,3),ifelse(eq(#ampm,1),'en_pm','en_am'),ifelse( ge(#hour24, 0) *lt(#hour24, 3), 'cntw_shengye' , ge(#hour24, 3) *lt(#hour24, 6), 'cntw_lingcheng' , ge(#hour24, 6) *lt(#hour24, 10), 'cntw_zaocheng' , ge(#hour24, 10) *lt(#hour24, 12), 'cntw_shangwu' , ge(#hour24, 12) *lt(#hour24, 13), 'cntw_zhongwu' , ge(#hour24, 13) *lt(#hour24, 17), 'cntw_xiawu' , ge(#hour24, 17) *lt(#hour24, 19), 'cntw_bangwan' , ge(#hour24, 19) *lt(#hour24, 24), 'cntw_wanshang' , 'cntw_shengye' ))+'.png'
